SELECT QP.ID, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.MEMBER_ID, P.CREATED_DATE
FROM TBL_QA_POST QP JOIN TBL_POST P ON QP.ID = P.ID WHERE QP.ID = #{id}

SELECT QP2.ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_MAJOR, QP2.UPDATED_DATE, QP2.POST_TITLE, QP2.POST_CONTENT, QP2.POST_VIEW FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, QP1.ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_MAJOR, QP1.UPDATED_DATE, QP1.POST_TITLE, QP1.POST_CONTENT, QP1.POST_VIEW FROM ( SELECT QP.ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_MAJOR, QP.UPDATED_DATE , QP.POST_TITLE, QP.POST_CONTENT, QP.POST_VIEW FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN ( SELECT QP0.ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID, POST_VIEW, UPDATED_DATE FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_QA_POST QP0 ON P.ID = QP0.ID ) QP ON M.ID = QP.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY QP.ID DESC ) QP1 ) QP2
WHERE R >= #{startRow} AND R <= #{endRow}
ORDER BY UPDATED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY POST_VIEW DESC
